Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
InputCheck = Instance.new("ScreenGui") InputCheck.Name = "InputCheck" InputFrame = Instance.new("Frame") InputFrame.Name = "InputButton" InputFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1 InputFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) InputFrame.Parent = InputCheck
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
FrameRate = (1 / 20)
ToolEquipped = false
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Mouse1", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("Mouse1", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("Key", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("Key", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) if Jumping then Jumping:disconnect() end Jumping = Humanoid.Jumping:connect(function() InvokeServer("Dismount", {Dismount = true}) end) Spawn(function() local PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then InputCheckClone = InputCheck:Clone() if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then InputCheckClone = InputCheck:Clone() InputCheckClone.InputButton.InputBegan:connect(function() InvokeServer("Mouse1", {Down = true}) end) InputCheckClone.InputButton.InputEnded:connect(function() InvokeServer("Mouse1", {Down = false}) end) InputCheckClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) while ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and CurrentlyEquipped do if Mouse then InvokeServer("MouseUpdate", Mouse.Hit) end wait(FrameRate) end end) end
function Unequipped() if CheckIfAlive() then Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall) end if InputCheckClone then Debris:AddItem(InputCheckClone, 0) end ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Animations = { Throw = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Throw"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil}, Sit = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Sit"), FadeTime = 0.25, Weight = nil, Speed = nil} }
Sounds = { Flying = Handle:WaitForChild("Flying"), EngineOn = Handle:WaitForChild("EngineOn"), EngineOff = Handle:WaitForChild("EngineOff"), SpaceLaser = Handle:WaitForChild("SpaceLaser"), DigitalBeep = Handle:WaitForChild("DigitalBeep"), SystemShutDown = Handle:WaitForChild("SystemShutDown"), Alarm = Handle:WaitForChild("Alarm"), Explosion = Handle:WaitForChild("Explosion"), }
ParticlesBin = script:WaitForChild("Particles") Particles = {} for i, v in pairs(ParticlesBin:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then Particles[v.Name] = v end end
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, }
BasePlane = BasePart:Clone() BasePlane.Name = "Plane" BasePlane.Size = Vector3.new(1.75, 1.25, 3) BasePlane.CanCollide = true Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "297060328"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "297060434"), Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = BasePlane, }
Rate = (1 / 30) Gravity = 196.20
Control = 0 EndFlight = false
MouseDown = Create("BoolValue"){ Value = false, } ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ServerControl", Parent = Tool, })
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ClientControl", Parent = Tool, })
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end
function ThrowPlane()
if not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or not CurrentlyEquipped then return end
Plane = BasePlane:Clone() Plane.Name = (Player.Name .. "'s SpaceCraft") Plane.CanCollide = false Plane.CFrame = Handle.CFrame
local PlaneSounds = {}
for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do local Sound = v:Clone() PlaneSounds[Sound.Name] = Sound Sound.Parent = Plane end
local FireEmitters = { Vector3.new(1.5, 0.1, 7), Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.1, 7), Vector3.new(0.75, -1.85,6), Vector3.new(-0.75, -1.85,6), }
local PlaneMesh = Plane.Mesh
BodyPosition = Create("BodyPosition"){ maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), position = Plane.Position, Parent = Plane, }
BodyGyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), Parent = Plane, }
Plane.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local Delta = 0 Mode = 0 EndFlight = false PlaneGoTo = nil
Spawn(function() local EaseRate = (1 / 60) local ChangeRate = 30 local Duration = 1.5 local Frames = (Duration * ChangeRate) for i = 1, Frames do if not Plane or not Plane.Parent or not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or EndFlight then return end local Size = ((Vector3.new(7.5, 5.25, 13) / Frames) * i) local Scale = ((Vector3.new(9, 9, 9) / Frames) * i) if (Size.X * Size.Y * Size.Z) > BasePlane:GetMass() then local OrigCF = Plane.CFrame Plane.Size = Size PlaneMesh.Scale = Scale Plane.CFrame = OrigCF end wait(EaseRate) end Mode = 1 end)
local ParticleParts = {}
local Flames = {} local Smokes = {}
if MouseDownChanged then MouseDownChanged:disconnect() end
local LastValue = MouseDown.Value
MouseDownChanged = MouseDown.Changed:connect(function() if not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or LastValue == MouseDown.Value then return end LastValue = MouseDown.Value for i, v in pairs({Flames, Smokes}) do for ii, vv in pairs(v) do if vv and vv.Parent then vv.Enabled = false Debris:AddItem(vv, 1.5) end end end if MouseDown.Value then Sounds.EngineOn:Play() PlaneSounds.Flying:Play() for i, v in pairs(ParticleParts) do if v.Part and v.Part.Parent and v.Weld and v.Weld.Parent and v.Weld.Part0 == Plane and v.Weld.Part1 == v.Part then local Flame = Particles.Fire:Clone() Flame.Enabled = true table.insert(Flames, Flame) Flame.Parent = v.Part end end elseif not MouseDown.Value then Sounds.EngineOff:Play() PlaneSounds.Flying:Stop() for i, v in pairs(ParticleParts) do if v.Part and v.Part.Parent and v.Weld and v.Weld.Parent and v.Weld.Part0 == Plane and v.Weld.Part1 == v.Part then local Smoke = Particles.Smoke:Clone() Smoke.Enabled = true table.insert(Smokes, Smoke) Debris:AddItem(Smoke, 3) Delay(1.5, (function() Smoke.Enabled = false end)) Smoke.Parent = v.Part end end end end) local RandomEffect = {Tick = 0, Delay = -1} while CheckIfAlive() and ToolEquipped and Plane and Plane.Parent and not EndFlight and CurrentlyEquipped do local Speed = ((MouseDown.Value and 10) or 4) if Mode == 0 then BodyPosition.position = (Plane.Position + Plane.CFrame.lookVector * Speed) BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Plane.Position, BodyPosition.position) elseif (Mode == 1) then if not Plane or not Plane.Parent then EndFlight = true break end Plane.CanCollide = true for i, v in pairs(FireEmitters) do local ParticlePart = BasePart:Clone() ParticlePart.Name = "Effect" ParticlePart.Transparency = 1 ParticlePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) ParticlePart.CanCollide = false local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Part0 = Plane, Part1 = ParticlePart, C0 = (CFrame.new(v) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0)), C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = ParticlePart, } table.insert(ParticleParts, {Part = ParticlePart, Weld = Weld}) ParticlePart.Parent = Plane end TorsoWeld = Create("Weld"){ Part0 = Plane, Part1 = Torso, C0 = (CFrame.new(-0.1, 1, 0.5) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)), C1 = (CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)), Parent = Plane, } Spawn(function() InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Sit) end) Humanoid.Sit = true Plane.Parent = Tool Mode = 3 elseif Mode == 3 then if not TorsoWeld or not TorsoWeld.Parent or TorsoWeld.Part0 ~= Plane or TorsoWeld.Part1 ~= Torso then EndFlight = true break end Control = 1 Humanoid.Sit = true local DeltaSpeed = (Speed * (Delta / Rate)) BodyPosition.position = (Plane.Position + Plane.CFrame.lookVector * DeltaSpeed) BodyGyro.cframe = (CFrame.new(BodyPosition.position) * CFrame.Angles(Plane.CFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ())) if PlaneGoTo then local PlaneGoToWorld = (Plane.Position + PlaneGoTo) BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Plane.Position, PlaneGoToWorld) end local Now = tick() if (Now - RandomEffect.Tick) >= RandomEffect.Delay then if RandomEffect.Delay >= 0 then local RandomSounds = {PlaneSounds.SpaceLaser, PlaneSounds.DigitalBeep, PlaneSounds.SystemShutDown, PlaneSounds.Alarm} local Sound = RandomSounds[math.random(1, #RandomSounds)] Sound.Pitch = (math.random(750, 1250) * 0.001) Sound.Volume = (math.random(500, 750) * 0.001) Sound:Play() end RandomEffect.Tick = Now RandomEffect.Delay = (math.random(2500, 10000) * 0.001) end end Delta = wait() end Spawn(function() InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.Sit) end) if MouseDownChanged then MouseDownChanged:disconnect() end Debris:AddItem(Plane, 5) Plane.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") for i, v in pairs(ParticleParts) do if v.Part and v.Part.Parent then if v.Weld then v.Weld.Part0 = nil v.Weld.Part1 = nil end v.Part.Anchored = true v.Part.CanCollide = false for ii, vv in pairs(v.Part:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then vv.Enabled = false end end end end Plane.Anchored = true Plane.CanCollide = false local Explosion = Create("Explosion"){ BlastPressure = 0, BlastRadius = 50, ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters, Position = Plane.Position, Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") } local SoundPart = BasePart:Clone() SoundPart.Name = "Effect" SoundPart.Transparency = 1 SoundPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) SoundPart.CanCollide = false SoundPart.Anchored = true local Sound = Sounds.Explosion:Clone() Sound.Parent = SoundPart Debris:AddItem(SoundPart, 2) SoundPart.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") SoundPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(Explosion.Position) Sound:Play() local EaseRate = (1 / 60) local ChangeRate = 30 local Duration = 0.25 local Frames = (Duration * ChangeRate) for i = 1, Frames do if not Plane or not Plane.Parent then return end local Size = (Vector3.new(7.5, 5.25, 13) - ((Vector3.new(7.5, 5.25, 13) / Frames) * i)) local Scale = (Vector3.new(9, 9, 9) - ((Vector3.new(9, 9, 9) / Frames) * i)) --if (Size.X * Size.Y * Size.Z) > BasePlane:GetMass() then local OrigCF = Plane.CFrame Plane.Size = Size PlaneMesh.Scale = Scale Plane.CFrame = OrigCF -- end wait(EaseRate) end if Plane and Plane.Parent then Plane:Destroy() end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent and Player:IsA("Player")) and true) or false) end
function Activated() if not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or not Tool.Enabled or (Plane and Plane.Parent) then return end Tool.Enabled = false if AnimationTrack then AnimationTrack:Stop() end CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) local Animation = Animations.Throw AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animation.Animation) AnimationTrack.KeyframeReached:connect(function(Keyframe) if not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or not CurrentlyEquipped then Tool.Enabled = true return end if Keyframe == "throw" then Handle.Transparency = 1 ThrowPlane() Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end) AnimationTrack:Play(Animation.FadeTime, Animation.Weight, Animation.Speed) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true Tool.Enabled = true end
function Unequipped() if AnimationTrack then AnimationTrack:Stop() end MouseDown.Value = false ToolEquipped = false Tool.Enabled = true end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function OnServerInvoke(client, action, value) if client ~= Player or not action or not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped then return end if action == "Mouse1" then local Down = value.Down MouseDown.Value = Down elseif action == "Key" then local Key = value.Key local Down = value.Down elseif action == "MouseUpdate" then local hit = value if Control == 1 and MouseDown.Value and Plane and Plane.Parent then PlaneGoTo = (hit.p - Plane.Position) end elseif action == "Dismount" and Mode == 3 then local Dismount = value.Dismount if Dismount then EndFlight = true end end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
